tr_quotes.quote: Rahatlığın sona erip sıkıntının başladığı yerde, yaşamın bize vermeyi amaçladığı eğitim başlar.
tr_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

tr_quotes.quote: Bilginin efendisi olmak istersen, çalışmanın kölesi olmalısın.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi, bölüşüldükçe artan hazinedir.
tr_quotes.author: Bhartrihari

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi cesaret verir, cehalet küstahlık.
tr_quotes.author: Terry

tr_quotes.quote: Soru da bilgiden doğar, cevap da.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi, sakalla ölçülmez.
tr_quotes.author: Moliére

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi, kar topu gibi yuvarlandıkça büyür.
tr_quotes.author: L. Sidney

tr_quotes.quote: Her bildiğini söyleme; fakat her söylediğini bil.
tr_quotes.author: Matrel Lenoir

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeyi gerçekten bilmek, onu anlatmakla olur.
tr_quotes.author: Socrates

tr_quotes.quote: Emek ver, kulak ver, bilgi ver, ama sakın boş verme.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Bilmek, Tanrı’ya yaklaşmak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Ernest Renan

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek bilgi; yaparak, denenerek öğrenilen bilgidir.
tr_quotes.author: Descartes

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi olmayan yerde, cehalet ilim olur.
tr_quotes.author: G.B. Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Her bildiğini söyleme; fakat her söylediğini bil.
tr_quotes.author: Matrel Lenoir

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgili olduğumuz oranda özgür oluruz.
tr_quotes.author: Socrates

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi, hürriyetin ayrılmaz bir parçasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgiden kanatlar tak, cennete uçmak için.
tr_quotes.author: W. Shakespeare

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece bir iyi vardır, bilgi; ve sadece bir kötü vardır, cehalet.
tr_quotes.author: Socrates

tr_quotes.quote: Bilginin üç temel taşı: Çok görmek, çok ıstırap çekmek ve çok çalışmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Catherall

tr_quotes.quote: Edindiğin bilgiler giysilerine benzememeli, sen yıkanırken akıp gitmemelidir.
tr_quotes.author: El Buruni

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan ne kadar az bilirse, o kadar çok bildiğini sanır.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Aklın ve bilginin üç büyük düşmanı vardır: Kötülük, bilgisizlik ve tembelliktir.
tr_quotes.author: Haeckel

tr_quotes.quote: Ölüler güç ve bilgilerini beraberinde götürmezler, yaşayanlara ilave ederler.
tr_quotes.author: Kızılderili Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi adası ne kadar büyük olursa, şaşma kıyısı da o kadar büyük olur.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph W. Stockman

tr_quotes.quote: Bilginin olduğu yerde bilenler, aklın olduğu yerde düşünenler vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Yusuf Has Hacip

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgisiz dürüstlük zayıf ve faydasızdır, dürüst olmayan bilgi ise tehlikeli ve korkunçtur.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi, sınırı olmayan bir denizdir. Bilgi dileyense denizlere dalan bir dalgıçtır.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi iki çeşittir; bir konuyu bilmek, o konuyu nereden öğreneceğini bilmek.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Denenmiş bir bilgi yarım bilgidir, ne işe yarayacağı kesin değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Amiel

tr_quotes.quote: Gençken bilgi ağacını dikelim ki yaşlandığımız zaman, gölgesinde barınacak bir yerimiz olsun.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

tr_quotes.quote: Erdemlerin en büyüğü bilimdir, bilgidir.
tr_quotes.author: Farabi

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgisiz bir kimse savaş davuluna benzer, sesi çok, içi boştur.
tr_quotes.author: Sadi

tr_quotes.quote: Faydalı ile faydasızı ayırt edebilenler, bilgi sahibi olanlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Edebali

tr_quotes.quote: Soru da bilgiden doğar, cevap da.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Yükselmenin merdiveni 5 basamak: İyilik, doğruluk, çalışmak, bilgi, sevmek.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın, cahil olduğunu bilmesi bilgiye atılmış ilk adımdır.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçeğin bilgisi deneyle başlar, deneyle biter.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Kitap ekip, bilgi biçin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çok dinle fakat az konuş. Sözü akıl ile söyle ve bilgi ile süsle.
tr_quotes.author: Yusuf Has Hacip

tr_quotes.quote: Bilginin efendisi olmak için çalışmanın uşağı olmak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Honore De Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi doğuştan akılda yoktur, ama akıl bilgiyi üretecek kapasitededir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü bilgiden daha önemlidir. Çünkü bilgi sınırlıyken, hayal gücü tüm dünyayı kapsar.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi konuşur, bilge dinler.
tr_quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarını bilen kimse bilgili, kendini bilen kimse akıllıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgisayarlardan korkmuyorum. Onların yokluğundan korkuyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmek akıntıya karşı yüzmeye benzer, bilgi edinmede ilerlemediğiniz zaman gerilersiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Çin atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi, peşi sıra acı getirir sana. Bilgin arttıkça, ne kadar da az şey bildiğinin farkına varır ve kederlenirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Behram Su

tr_quotes.quote: Edindiği bilgileri dağıtmaya yanaşmayan cimrilerin en cimrisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Semih Yaşar

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar okursan oku, bilgine yakışır şekilde davranmazsan, cahilsin demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Cumhuriyet düşüncede, bilgide, sağlıkta güçlü ve yüksek karakterli koruyucular ister.
tr_quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi her zaman güç değildir, bazı zamanlar yüktür.
tr_quotes.author: Jean Buriere

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamak, kendi kendini adam etmektir. Zeka ve bilgiyi kullanarak etinden kemiğinden kendi heykelini yapmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi aşağıdakileri yükseltir, bilgisizlik yukarıdakileri alçaltır
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali (ra)

en_quotes.quote: A people without the knowledge of their past history, origin and culture is like a tree without roots
en_quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

en_quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: To know what you know and what you do not know, that is true knowledge
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance
en_quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

en_quotes.quote: In conversation, humor is worth more than wit and easiness more than knowledge
en_quotes.author: George Herbert

en_quotes.quote: The aim of education is the knowledge, not of facts, but of values
en_quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind
en_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

en_quotes.quote: The only source of knowledge is experience
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Ignorance is the curse of God; knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to heaven
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: For the things of this world cannot be made known without a knowledge of mathematics
en_quotes.author: Roger Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Opinion is the medium between knowledge and ignorance
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: All true happiness, pure joy, sweet bounties, and unclouded pleasure are contained within the knowledge and love of God
en_quotes.author: Said Nursi

en_quotes.quote: It is beyond a doubt that all our knowledge begins with experience
en_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

en_quotes.quote: Great teachers emanate out of knowledge, passion and compassion
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: Thought is the wind and knowledge the sail
en_quotes.author: David Hare

en_quotes.quote: Grace is not part of consciousness; it is the amount of light in our souls, not knowledge nor reason
en_quotes.author: Pope Francis

en_quotes.quote: No man's knowledge here can go beyond his experience
en_quotes.author: John Locke

en_quotes.quote: To know, is to know that you know nothing. That is the meaning of true knowledge
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Humility and knowledge in poor clothes excel pride and ignorance in costly attire
en_quotes.author: William Penn

en_quotes.quote: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: Faith is a knowledge within the heart, beyond the reach of proof
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: To know that we know what we know, and to know that we do not know what we do not know, that is true knowledge
en_quotes.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

en_quotes.quote: In your thirst for knowledge, be sure not to drown in all the information
en_quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: Where there is shouting, there is no true knowledge
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: The degree of one's emotions varies inversely with one's knowledge of the facts
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Liberty cannot be preserved without general knowledge among the people
en_quotes.author: John Adams

en_quotes.quote: For my own part, I would rather excel in knowledge of the highest secrets of philosophy than in arms
en_quotes.author: Alexander the Great

en_quotes.quote: It is possible to fly without motors, but not without knowledge and skill
en_quotes.author: Wilbur Wright

en_quotes.quote: I wash my hands of those who imagine chattering to be knowledge, silence to be ignorance, and affection to be art
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: The more knowledge you have, the greater will be your fear of Allah
en_quotes.author: Abu Bakr

en_quotes.quote: There comes a time when the mind takes a higher plane of knowledge but can never prove how it got there
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: The general knowledge of time on the island depends, curiously enough, on the direction of the wind
en_quotes.author: John Millington Synge

en_quotes.quote: Let us tenderly and kindly cherish, therefore, the means of knowledge. Let us dare to read, think, speak, and write
en_quotes.author: John Adams

en_quotes.quote: The secret of improved plant breeding, apart from scientific knowledge, is love
en_quotes.author: Luther Burbank

en_quotes.quote: Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless, and knowledge without integrity is dangerous and dreadful
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: The knowledge of yourself will preserve you from vanity
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

en_quotes.quote: The only fence against the world is a thorough knowledge of it
en_quotes.author: John Locke

en_quotes.quote: There is much pleasure to be gained from useless knowledge
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: The true method of knowledge is experiment
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: The past is a source of knowledge, and the future is a source of hope. Love of the past implies faith in the future
en_quotes.author: Stephen Ambrose

en_quotes.quote: Our knowledge is a little island in a great ocean of nonknowledge
en_quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is love and light and vision
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: There's no such thing is aging, but maturing and knowledge. It's beautiful, I call that beauty
en_quotes.author: Celine Dion

en_quotes.quote: All our knowledge has its origins in our perceptions
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is the treasure of a wise man
en_quotes.author: William Penn

en_quotes.quote: A physician without a knowledge of Astrology has no right to call himself a physician
en_quotes.author: Hippocrates

en_quotes.quote: Consider your origins: you were not made to live as brutes, but to follow virtue and knowledge
en_quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

en_quotes.quote: My basic knowledge about Punjabi comes from films
en_quotes.author: Ileana D'Cruz

en_quotes.quote: The end of all knowledge should be service to others
en_quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

en_quotes.quote: A country without engineering skill and knowledge will never become a developed country
en_quotes.author: Mahathir Mohamad

en_quotes.quote: Zeal without knowledge is fire without light
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: I had therefore to remove knowledge, in order to make room for belief
en_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

en_quotes.quote: Where is all the knowledge we lost with information?
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is only one half. Faith is the other
en_quotes.author: Novalis

en_quotes.quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: I listened more than I studied... therefore little by little my knowledge and ability were developed
en_quotes.author: Joseph Haydn

en_quotes.quote: It is not ignorance but knowledge which is the mother of wonder
en_quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

en_quotes.quote: The best theology is rather a divine life than a divine knowledge
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

en_quotes.quote: The desire of knowledge, like the thirst of riches, increases ever with the acquisition of it
en_quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

en_quotes.quote: The knowledge I have now is not the knowledge I had then
en_quotes.author: Stokely Carmichael

en_quotes.quote: Those who have knowledge, don't predict. Those who predict, don't have knowledge
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge of what is does not open the door directly to what should be
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge which is acquired under compulsion obtains no hold on the mind
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge has to be improved, challenged, and increased constantly, or it vanishes
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: Some people drink from the fountain of knowledge, others just gargle
en_quotes.author: Robert Anthony

en_quotes.quote: Even the knowledge of my own fallibility cannot keep me from making mistakes. Only when I fall do I get up again
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: To help, to continually help and share, that is the sum of all knowledge; that is the meaning of art
en_quotes.author: Eleonora Duse

en_quotes.quote: The knowledge and insights you can get in just one day at a writers' conference make it worth the trip
en_quotes.author: Tomi Adeyemi

en_quotes.quote: I had given up some youth for knowledge, but my gain was more valuable than the loss
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: The recipe for perpetual ignorance is: Be satisfied with your opinions and content with your knowledge
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge of the past and of the places of the earth is the ornament and food of the mind of man
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is soon changed, then lost in the mist, an echo half-heard
en_quotes.author: Gene Wolfe

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge becomes evil if the aim be not virtuous
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: It is not the quantity but the quality of knowledge which determines the mind's dignity
en_quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is true opinion
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: No man can reveal to you nothing but that which already lies half-asleep in the dawning of your knowledge
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: The price one pays for pursuing any profession, or calling, is an intimate knowledge of its ugly side
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: Perplexity is the beginning of knowledge
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: The knowledge of anything, since all things have causes, is not acquired or complete unless it is known by its causes
en_quotes.author: Avicenna

en_quotes.quote: Our knowledge is a receding mirage in an expanding desert of ignorance
en_quotes.author: Will Durant

en_quotes.quote: Without knowledge action is useless and knowledge without action is futile
en_quotes.author: Abu Bakr

en_quotes.quote: The first step in a person's salvation is knowledge of their sin
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: When a man's knowledge is not in order, the more of it he has the greater will be his confusion
en_quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

en_quotes.quote: But although all our knowledge begins with experience, it does not follow that it arises from experience
en_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

en_quotes.quote: It is one of my sources of happiness never to desire a knowledge of other people's business
en_quotes.author: Dolley Madison

en_quotes.quote: Fine art is knowledge made visible
en_quotes.author: Gustave Courbet

en_quotes.quote: Imparting knowledge is only lighting other men's candles at our lamp without depriving ourselves of any flame
en_quotes.author: Jane Porter

en_quotes.quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action
en_quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

en_quotes.quote: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge
en_quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

en_quotes.quote: To express the same idea in still another way, I think that human knowledge is essentially active
en_quotes.author: Jean Piaget

en_quotes.quote: There is no greater impediment to the advancement of knowledge than the ambiguity of words
en_quotes.author: Thomas Reid

en_quotes.quote: We are here and it is now. Further than that, all human knowledge is moonshine
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: We are drowning in information but starved for knowledge
en_quotes.author: John Naisbitt

en_quotes.quote: The search for knowledge is a long and difficult task
en_quotes.author: Fabiola Gianotti

en_quotes.quote: As knowledge increases, wonder deepens
en_quotes.author: Charles Morgan

en_quotes.quote: All knowledge of cultural reality, as may be seen, is always knowledge from particular points of view
en_quotes.author: Max Weber

en_quotes.quote: The knowledge of the theory of logic has no tendency whatever to make men good reasoners
en_quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge of God's Word is a bulwark against deception, temptation, accusation, even persecution
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: I and my colleagues here have been engaged in the pursuit of knowledge
en_quotes.author: Frederick Sanger

en_quotes.quote: Kids are smart. Knowledge is power. Let them figure things out. Don't turn into that grown-up who they won't come to
en_quotes.author: Lauren Myracle

en_quotes.quote: The aim of education is the knowledge not of facts but of values
en_quotes.author: William Inge

en_quotes.quote: How can smart women be so stupid about men sometimes? Lack of knowledge. It's what men have kept secret for so long
en_quotes.author: Steve Harvey

en_quotes.quote: A healthy vision of the future is not possible without an accurate knowledge of the past
en_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

en_quotes.quote: To know how to dissimulate is the knowledge of kings
en_quotes.author: Cardinal Richelieu

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is an unending adventure at the edge of uncertainty
en_quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

en_quotes.quote: Hubble isn't just a satellite; it's about humanity's quest for knowledge
en_quotes.author: John M. Grunsfeld

en_quotes.quote: When a doctor does go wrong he is the first of criminals. He has nerve and he has knowledge
en_quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

en_quotes.quote: Therefore when the mind knows itself and loves itself, there remains a trinity, that is the mind, love and knowledge
en_quotes.author: Peter Lombard

en_quotes.quote: Devotion complete culminates in knowledge supreme
en_quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

en_quotes.quote: Zeal will do more than knowledge
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: Too much knowledge and analysis can be paralysis
en_quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is the prime need of the hour
en_quotes.author: Mary McLeod Bethune

en_quotes.quote: I don't know what is better than the work that is given to the actor - to teach the human heart the knowledge of itself
en_quotes.author: Laurence Olivier

en_quotes.quote: The larger the island of knowledge, the longer the shoreline of wonder
en_quotes.author: Ralph W. Sockman

en_quotes.quote: Only divine love bestows the keys of knowledge
en_quotes.author: Arthur Rimbaud

en_quotes.quote: Mythology is a vast body of knowledge that has not been tapped
en_quotes.author: Devdutt Pattanaik

en_quotes.quote: You move forward through knowledge. You prevail through knowledge. I love the word 'prevail.' Prevail!
en_quotes.author: James D. Watson

en_quotes.quote: Bobby Fischer has an enormous knowledge of chess and his familiarity with the chess literature of the USSR is immense
en_quotes.author: Boris Spassky

en_quotes.quote: I really like knowledge and reading books and just generally immersing myself in information
en_quotes.author: Adam D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: There is no desire more natural than the desire for knowledge
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Information is not knowledge
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Helping someone come to a saving knowledge of Christ is the greatest achievement possible
en_quotes.author: Charles Stanley

en_quotes.quote: And what, Socrates, is the food of the soul? Surely, I said, knowledge is the food of the soul
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is knowing that we cannot know
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: All men by nature desire knowledge
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: The natural desire of good men is knowledge
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: A writer of fiction is really... a congenital liar who invents from his own knowledge or that of other men
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: There is no substitute for accurate knowledge. Know yourself, know your business, know your men
en_quotes.author: Lee Iacocca
